abstract: An American billionaire investor, Wilbur L. Ross, plans to buy shares of China Longyuan Power Group, the largest wind power generator in Asia, which aims to raise up to $2.2 billion from its Hong Kong initial public offering, according to a preliminary prospectus.

lead_paragraph: An American billionaire investor, Wilbur L. Ross, plans to buy shares of China Longyuan Power Group, the largest wind power generator in Asia, which aims to raise up to $2.2 billion from its Hong Kong initial public offering, according to a preliminary prospectus.

headline.main: China Longyuan I.P.O. Attracts Billionaire Investor
